mapper.insert: INSERT INTO borrow (borrow_id, bicycle_id, user_id, borrow_start_time, borrow_end_time, borrow_start_x, borrow_start_y, borrow_end_x, borrow_end_y, cost, remaining) VALUES (#{borrowId}, #{bicycleId}, #{userId}, #{borrowStartTime}, #{borrowEndTime}, #{borrowStartX}, #{borrowStartY}, #{borrowEndX}, #{borrowEndY}, #{cost}, #{remaining})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM borrow ORDER BY borrow_id DESC
